outgoingDisclaimer: Будь-яке повідомлення, яке буде Ви надсилаєте сюди буде переадресовано до персоналу.
dmError: Вибачте, але Ви не можете виконувати цю команду в приватних повідомленнях.
noContext: You haven't provided the context! Please add both the string ID and the context explaining it.
noUserQuote: You haven't provided a user! Please type the quote and then mention the quoted user, separated by a slash.
disabled: This command has been temporarily disabled.
noTrPr: You're not a translator or proofreader, so you can't use this!
noAccess: You're not allowed to execute this command!
noPermission: You're not allowed to execute this command on this channel!
contextSubArg:
Please enter a subcommand as first argument. This can either be `get`, `add`, `edit`, `link` or `help`.
For information, run `+context help`.
timeLeftT: Будь ласка, зачекайте ще %%time%% секунд(у\\и), щоб використовувати `+%%command%%` знову.
minsLeftT: Please wait another %%time%% minutes to use `+%%command%%` again.
linkCorrection: %%user%% Please change the link to the `crowdin.com/translate/.../.../en-en` format next time.

tips.0: Have you tried the Inhale Banana language? Change your language to it using `+lang ib`!
tips.1: I need translators! Find out how to become a bot translator at %%translate%%.
tips.2: Have you tried Emoji language? Change your language to it using `+lang em`!
tips.3: Please change your links to en-en!
tips.4: You get random amounts of XP every minute when you're chatting, which will eventually make you level up.
tips.5: We need more tips! Submit them using `+feedback`.
tips.6: Did you know we have a guide on how to get started with Crowdin, available for all translators? Check it out at %%gettingStarted%%, it has some useful tips!
tips.7: Have you followed our twitter account? Check it out at %%twitter%%!
tips.8: %%rules%% and %%serverInfo%% have all the info you need about this server!
tips.9: Found a mistake in a translation? Contact a proofreader for your language or let people know in a translation channel.
tips.10: Did you know most channels have important information pinned? You should check it out every time you visit one!
